definition: two (colloquial equivalent of 兩個|两个)/both/some
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
erhua variant of 倆錢兒|俩钱儿[lia3 qian2 r5]
two bits/a small amount of money

sentences.english: Shawn boomed. "There is endless bounty there for both of us.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩低声说，“那儿会给我们俩无尽的礼物。

sentences.english: The two dueled, transforming the office of politics into an arena of lightsaber combat.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩展开决斗，把政府办公室变成光剑格斗场。

sentences.english: My sincere congratulations on this auspicious event of yours.
sentences.chinese: 值你俩大喜之日，谨致最诚挚的祝贺。

sentences.english: Have you ever smooched at the movies?
sentences.chinese: 你俩在这电影里拥吻了吗？

sentences.english: The two brothers quickly came to blows during their quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 这俩兄弟互相争吵，很快就变成了拳脚相加。

sentences.english: They both passed on their bacons at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩都同时把接力棒传了过去。

sentences.english: I think that's because Baggio is our favorite star.
sentences.chinese: 我想那是因为巴乔是我们俩最喜欢的球星的缘故吧。

sentences.english: We both had been sitting on the Longquan hill for whole day.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩坐在龙泉山上，整整一天没有下来。

sentences.english: She stared towards them and they ran to his car and sped off.
sentences.chinese: 她紧盯着他们，他们俩吓得赶紧跑进车开走了。

sentences.english: Shi Xiang summer Guanci apprehend came to see two people is exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 缉拿施襄夏的官差赶来，看到是精疲力竭的俩人。

sentences.english: I am very grateful to them. Thinking of them as confidants .
sentences.chinese: 我非常感激他们俩，感谢他们成为我的知己。

sentences.english: Congratulations to you both and may the years ahead bring you continued joy and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 向你俩祝贺，愿时间白叟赐赉你们长久的幸福和满意。

sentences.english: We bumped into each other when we were shopping in the Trust Mart.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都在好又多购物时，撞见了彼此。

sentences.english: The two co-star as husband and wife in the upcoming film Dream House, slated for a fall release.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩将在秋季上演的电影《恶灵凶宅》中扮演夫妻。

sentences.english: The two stood there for a good while, not speaking.
sentences.chinese: 爷孙俩在那里站了好一会儿，却一句话都没说。

sentences.english: So, it is a mountain that we are both climbing.
sentences.chinese: 因此这是一座我们俩都在攀越的山峰。

definition: three (colloquial equivalent of 三個|三个)
erhua variant of 一塊|一块[yi1 kuai4]
erhua variant of 小兩口|小两口[xiao3 liang3 kou3]
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
brothers/younger brother/CL:個|个[ge4]/I, me (humble term used by men in public speech)/brotherly/fraternal
